job_description:
You will play an essential role in expanding PanScope’s global footprint. As the Director of Partnerships, you will have the opportunity to autonomously form and manage strategic partnerships that align with and enhance our mission at PanScope.

All ages and education levels are welcome!
Responsibilities :
Identify, develop, and manage strategic partnerships with NGOs, governments, youth-led initiatives, and other relevant organizations.
Oversee the implementation and management of collaborative projects.
Represent PanScope in external meetings and forums.
Requirements:
Strong negotiation and relationship-building skills.
Demonstrated strength in communication and interpersonal skills
Ability to work independently and strategically.

Qualifications: Demonstrated strength in communication and interpersonal skills
Ability to work independently and strategically
